summary: The document is a form related to the military personnel security investigation process, specifically concerning David Reed Fromer for induction into the military. It details the requester, the subject of the investigation, and the actions taken by the control office, including the classification status and restrictions of the record. The document was regraded to unclassified on 2 September 1994 and released with deletions on 03/07/95.
key_findings: The document is part of a military personnel security investigation process.
It involves a request for investigation of David Reed Fromer for induction, highlighting remarks made by the registrant.
The record was regraded to unclassified on 2 September 1994 and was released with deletions on 03/07/95.
The document includes sections for requester information, control office actions, and remarks regarding the investigation's outcome.
